name: generateTotpSecret
description: Use this endpoint to generate the time-based one time password (TOTP) secret key for a specified user account. The secret is a key value encoded in Base32 and includes a URI for generating a scannable QR code.

$ul: **secret**: String containing a generated secret key for the time-based one time password (TOTP) authentication method.
**secretUri**: String containing a generated URI for the time-based one time password (TOTP) authentication method. The URI includes the secret key and configuration information.
